arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Lyon: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang to start
arts.sum: Roberto De Zerbi is set to name a strong side to face Olympique Lyonnais in Sunday night’s Choc des Olympiques. Olympique de Marseille are, however, without a couple of key players. There…

arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Marseille: Tyler Morton in, Georges Mikautadze out as Villarreal transfer nears
arts.sum: Lyon host Marseille this Sunday at Groupama Stadium for a mouth-watering Choc des Olympiques to conclude Ligue 1’s third matchday. Paulo Fonseca’s Les Gones have the opportunity to pile the pressure on Marseille and…
